NK010(tha)002:0: phur pa rgyud lugs las stod las byang chub sgrub
NK010(tha)002:1: pa'i spyi chings d+r+wa ba sdom pa zhes bya ba
NK010(tha)002:2: bzhugs / sh+r+ai badz+ra ku m+aa ra n+aa ma /
NK010(tha)002:3: phur pa rgyud lugs zhes bya ba'i sgra don las
NK010(tha)002:4: de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs par bya ste
NK010(tha)002:5: / spyir sngags kyi sde snod thams cad rgyud la ma brten par mi 'byung la /
NK010(tha)002:6: de'i rang bzhin ni man+t+ra ya'i sgra las yid skyobs pa dang /
NK010(tha)002:8: snying rje'i don du drangs la /
NK010(tha)002:9: de dag gi slad du gsang ba'i sgra zhugs pa
NK010(tha)002:10: ni rtogs par dka' zhing sbas na 'grub pa'i don
NK010(tha)002:11: yin no // rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas brjod
NK010(tha)002:12: na gzhi'i rgyud ces bya ba khams bde gshegs snying
NK010(tha)002:13: yin no // po / lam gyi rgyud ces bya
NK010(tha)002:14: ba sngags dang phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gyi rim
NK010(tha)002:15: yin no // po / pa / 'bras bu'i rgyud
NK010(tha)002:16: ces bya ba dngos grub rnam pa gnyis bsgrub bya'i
NK010(tha)002:17: rgyud la rten cing 'brel 'byung gis bskyed pa'o //
NK010(tha)002:18: de las thog mar gzhi'i rgyud bde gshegs snying po'i
NK010(tha)002:19: rang bzhin ngo ma shes na stod las byang chub
NK010(tha)002:20: sgrub pa'i don ming rkyang du 'khyams pas dam pa'i
NK010(tha)002:21: bla ma la brten nas gshis kyi gnas lugs rtog
NK010(tha)002:22: dpyod sna tshogs kyis gtan la phab nas sems dang
NK010(tha)002:23: sems byung gi spros pa nye bar zhi ba'i ngang
NK010(tha)002:24: du bcos slad med par 'jog ste /
NK010(tha)002:26: e ma bde gshegs snying po ni //
NK010(tha)002:27: nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing //
NK010(tha)002:28: me long bzhin du gzung du med //
NK010(tha)002:29: brag cha bzhin du brjod dang bral //
NK010(tha)002:30: bcud kyi rdo rje snying po ni //
NK010(tha)002:31: bdag dang gzhan du dbye ru med //
NK010(tha)002:32: bstan du med pa'i chos nyid 'di //
NK010(tha)002:33: brjod du med kyis go bar gyis //
NK010(tha)002:35: de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin med par go nas /
NK010(tha)002:36: lam gyi rgyud lta sgom spyod gsum dang /
NK010(tha)002:37: de'i srog shing dam tshig bzhi la bstan pa'i tshul /
NK010(tha)002:39: de la phur pa'i lta ba ni //
NK010(tha)002:40: yul du snang ba thams cad kun //
NK010(tha)002:41: dbyings nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang //
NK010(tha)002:42: sems su snang ba thams cad ni //
NK010(tha)002:43: ma bcos rig pa'i de nyid yin //
NK010(tha)002:44: de nyid dbyer med mnyam par blta //
NK010(tha)002:45: de yi ngang du thams cad 'dus //
NK010(tha)002:46: phur pa zhes ni yang dag bshad //
NK010(tha)002:47: btsal du med pa'i chos nyid la //
NK010(tha)002:48: sgom du med pa'i 'bras bu shar //
NK010(tha)002:49: thams cad rang byung 'gag pa med //
NK010(tha)002:50: rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos shing //
NK010(tha)002:51: spros med rang byung lhun gyis grub //
NK010(tha)002:52: rgyu rkyen gnyis las mya ngan 'das //
NK010(tha)002:53: gdod nas ma bcos ye nas grub //
NK010(tha)002:54: dus gsum dbyer med mnyam par blta //
NK010(tha)002:55: de ni lta ba'i mchog yin te //
NK010(tha)002:56: lta ba de las 'das gyur na //
NK010(tha)002:58: de la phur pa'i spyod pa ni //
NK010(tha)002:59: rtsol ba med pa'i dbyings nyid la //
NK010(tha)002:60: snying po dran pas lhar bskyed nas //
NK010(tha)002:61: ci 'byor mchod pa phul nas kyang //
NK010(tha)002:62: rang gi lhar ni brtag par bya //
NK010(tha)002:63: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab //
NK010(tha)002:64: bsnyen pa'i phyir ni snying po bzlas //
NK010(tha)002:65: thams cad khro bo khro mor dmigs //
NK010(tha)002:67: ma 'grub bar du bsnyen pa bya //
NK010(tha)002:68: zhes lta bu'i don sgom pas nyams su blang zhing /
NK010(tha)002:69: de'i thabs kyi mchog tu dkyil 'khor dang /
NK010(tha)002:75: brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa ste rgyud kyi dngos po
NK010(tha)002:76: rnams dang breng chags su 'brel bas phung po dang
NK010(tha)002:77: rnam par shes pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsgrub
NK010(tha)002:78: pa ste / mkhas pas spro bsdu byas pa yi //
NK010(tha)002:80: slar 'dus rang gi bag chags bsreg /
NK010(tha)002:81: de ni las kyi rdo rje 'bar //
NK010(tha)002:82: phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas //
NK010(tha)002:83: rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom //
NK010(tha)002:86: lta sgom spyod pa gsum rgyun chags su 'brel bar nyams su blangs pa'i don la dngos bstan dang /
NK010(tha)002:87: rjes su mthun pa'i rgyud don 'byor pas thabs shin
NK010(tha)002:88: tu myur ba'i rgyu tshogs las chos nyid byang chub
NK010(tha)002:89: sems kyi phur bu'i don rtogs pa ste /
NK010(tha)002:90: dngos por snang ba'i shes rab ling+ga la //
NK010(tha)002:91: rang byung thabs kyi rgyal po'i phur pas btab //
NK010(tha)002:92: btab pa nyid nas brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das //
NK010(tha)002:94: phur pa byang chub sems kyi rtags //
NK010(tha)002:95: byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis //
NK010(tha)002:96: srid gsum 'khor ba gdar sha gcod //
NK010(tha)002:97: ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis rdzogs //
NK010(tha)002:98: zhes sogs rgya cher yod do //
NK010(tha)002:99: de ltar gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi rgyud don
NK010(tha)002:100: la byang chub pas rang don mthar phyin pa ni
NK010(tha)002:101: stod las byang chub sgrub pa'i ngo bo yin la
NK010(tha)002:102: / gzhan don gyi gtso bo smad las la brten
NK010(tha)002:103: nas zhi ba'i gdul byar ma gyur pa rnams kyi
NK010(tha)002:104: rnam shes ye shes dbyings su sbyar ba'i tshul ni
NK010(tha)002:105: spyod pa'i mtha' sdud yin te de nyid las /
NK010(tha)002:106: grub pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang //
NK010(tha)002:107: gang la dmigs pa'i ngo bo la //
NK010(tha)002:108: gdab pa'i las rnams byas nas ni //
NK010(tha)002:109: rnam shes ye shes dbyings su sbyar //
NK010(tha)002:110: lhag ma lha la bstab par bya //
NK010(tha)002:111: gzir gnan las rnams byas nas ni //
NK010(tha)002:112: las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za //
NK010(tha)002:113: de ni phur pa'i spyod pa yin //
NK010(tha)002:115: kun gyi srog tu gyur pa dam tshig ni /
NK010(tha)002:116: lta sgom spyod 'bras bzhi po dang dbang gi dus
NK010(tha)002:117: 'doms pa'i blang dor rnams bsgrub pa gtso bor dang
NK010(tha)002:118: du blangs pas rgyu 'bras dag grol du 'dzin pa'i
NK010(tha)002:119: theg pa gzhan las khyad par du byas pa'i dngos
NK010(tha)002:121: de la phur pa'i dam tshig ni //
NK010(tha)002:122: sgrub pa de ni gtso ru blang //
NK010(tha)002:123: dam tshig de ni ma nyams na //
NK010(tha)002:124: lta ba nyams kyang ltung mi 'gyur //
NK010(tha)002:125: lta ba de dag ma nyams na //
NK010(tha)002:126: spyod pa nyams kyang nyam mi nga //
NK010(tha)002:127: spyod pa de dag ma nyams na //
NK010(tha)002:130: rnam rtog 'khor ba'i d+r+wa ba ste //
NK010(tha)002:131: de nyid ye shes chen po'i dbyings //
NK010(tha)002:132: sdoma la sangs rgyas zhes bya ste //
NK010(tha)002:133: thabs kyi nang nas thabs mchog go //
NK010(tha)002:134: da ni yo ga gzhan pa dang chos skad thun
NK010(tha)002:135: mong ma yin pa rdo rje phur pa'i ting nge
NK010(tha)002:136: 'dzin rnam gsum gyi don cung zad ston te /
NK010(tha)002:137: de la spros pa'i mtha' bzhi'am brgyad dang bral ba'i
NK010(tha)002:138: stong nyid ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid yin
NK010(tha)002:140: gang gis kyang mi phyed cing mi shigs pa'i don gyis rdo rje ste /
NK010(tha)002:142: rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi //
NK010(tha)002:143: stong pa nyid la rdo rjer brjod //
NK010(tha)002:145: de yang rdzas kyi rdo rje pha lam la khyad chos bdun yod pa ltar /
NK010(tha)002:148: sngags kyi rdo rje yang mi chod pa la sogs
NK010(tha)002:149: pa'i chos bdud dang ldan pas rdo rje'i ming dang
NK010(tha)002:151: de lta bu'i shes rab la rnam par brtag pa'i
NK010(tha)002:152: cha nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin du
NK010(tha)002:153: btags nas / des gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa mtha'
NK010(tha)002:154: dag gcod cing gzhom pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi khros
NK010(tha)002:156: rdzogs rim mtshan bcas dang sbyar na gzhan lus kyi
NK010(tha)002:157: drags pa'i 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid lhan
NK010(tha)002:158: cig skyes pa'i bde chen du shar bas rkyen gyis
NK010(tha)002:159: khros pas ste / zhe sdang la sogs pa'i phra
NK010(tha)002:160: rgyas thams cad rang bzhin med par gcod pas na
NK010(tha)002:161: khros pas ste / / rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod //
NK010(tha)002:163: de lta bu'i stong nyid phyin ci ma log pa
NK010(tha)002:164: rtogs pa'i ngang na sgrib pa spangs pa'i sems bskyed
NK010(tha)002:165: rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i gdangs smon lam gyi dbang
NK010(tha)002:166: las de ltar ma rtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams
NK010(tha)002:167: la snying rje'i rang bzhin du snang ba la kun
NK010(tha)002:168: snang gi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste lhag bsam
NK010(tha)002:169: rnam dag gi sems bskyed do //
NK010(tha)002:170: rnam pa gcig tu na 'jug pa'i spyod pa la
NK010(tha)002:171: zhugs shing gzhan don la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen
NK010(tha)002:172: po de dang 'gal zlar gyur pa'i zhe sdang gi
NK010(tha)002:173: sems ni nam du'ang lhan cig mi 'du bas zhe
NK010(tha)002:174: sdang gcod pa'i sgra zhugs pa'o //
NK010(tha)002:176: bdud dang srin po'i nga rgyal ma yin te //
NK010(tha)002:177: 'dul ba'i dbang gis rab rngams mche ba gtsigs //
NK010(tha)002:179: de ltar kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin de nyid
NK010(tha)002:180: mched pa'i ye shes su langs pas yi ge'i rang
NK010(tha)002:181: bzhin du byung ba ni phra ba'i rags pa rgyu'i
NK010(tha)002:183: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i
NK010(tha)002:184: ngo bo nyid rnam par rig byed du mtshon par
NK010(tha)002:185: byed pa'i h'u chen sngon po mi 'gyur ba'i kha
NK010(tha)002:186: dog can chos nyid ci yang ma yin pa'i nam
NK010(tha)002:187: mkha' las chu las chu bur rdol ba'am /
NK010(tha)002:188: chos kyi dbyings nas thigs pa'i tshul du shar bas na /
NK010(tha)002:189: mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yi //
NK010(tha)002:190: nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar //
NK010(tha)002:192: de yang bsgrub bya rang nyid kyi phung po'i rigs 'dra gnas pa'i rten la tshe zhes bya ste /
NK010(tha)002:193: 'dod gzugs gnyis su drod dang rnam shes kyi rten byed la /
NK010(tha)002:194: gzugs med du rnam shes gcig pu'i rten du gyur
NK010(tha)002:195: pa'i srog gi ngo bo nyid du shar ba'i phyir
NK010(tha)002:196: / srog gi gor ru shar ba dang //
NK010(tha)002:198: de lta bu'i yi ge la slan chad kyang thugs
NK010(tha)002:199: srog tu gdags pa'i gzhi ni de nyid du rig
NK010(tha)002:200: par bya'o // de'i ngang las snying la sogs pa'i go lnga'i don spyir go zhes bya ba ni /
NK010(tha)002:206: go babs la sogs sgra 'jug pa'i yul mang zhing
NK010(tha)002:207: byings che ba zhig las 'dir rang rang gi ngo
NK010(tha)002:208: bo nyid ma 'dres par gzung ba'i yul lam gnas
NK010(tha)002:209: la sgra yangs par 'jug pas rnam rtog 'dod rgyal
NK010(tha)002:210: ba'i rnam smin gyi lus dang rten brten pa lta
NK010(tha)002:211: bur sbyor ba ma yin kyang /
NK010(tha)002:212: thabs bskyed pa'i rim pa yongs su 'grub pa'i bdag po'i rkyen dang /
NK010(tha)002:213: rten cing 'brel byung gi go 'byed pa'i don du sbyor shes par bya'o //
NK010(tha)002:214: de nas phung po rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgra don ni rang thad du bshad zin la /
NK010(tha)002:215: srid pa phur bur bsgrub pa ni yi ge nor ba'i phyogs 'ba' zhig tu ltung ba mang na /
NK010(tha)002:217: phyi don du snang ba'i khams gsum mam /
NK010(tha)002:218: sa 'og sa steng sa bla ste srid pa gsum
NK010(tha)002:219: po'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rdo rje
NK010(tha)002:220: gzhon nu'i rten dang brten pa'i ye shes kyi rol
NK010(tha)002:221: pa rnam par dag pa'i phur bu'i ngo bo nyid
NK010(tha)002:222: du bsgrub pa'am / snang ba rags pa 'dod khams kyi srid pa sku phyag rgya chen po /
NK010(tha)002:223: phyed snang bas gzugs khams kyi srid pa gsung grags stong rdo rjee'i rol mo //
NK010(tha)002:224: mi snang ba gzugs med khams kyi srid pa thugs
NK010(tha)002:225: rang bzhin rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gcig
NK010(tha)002:226: tu gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi phur bur
NK010(tha)002:227: sgrub pa'i don rig na stod las byang chub bsgrub
NK010(tha)002:228: pa gzugs brnyan las ldang bar 'gyur ro //
NK010(tha)002:229: bskyed rim rtogs pa'i d+r+wa ba tsam //
NK010(tha)002:230: ma yin ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyi //
NK010(tha)002:231: phyag rgya chen por sdoma shes na //
NK010(tha)002:232: rig 'dzin bzhi yi sa la snyeg /
NK010(tha)002:233: rig 'dzin 'jigs med gling pa'i rtogs chos so //
